channel.title: Brands on InfluxData Branding Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Brands on InfluxData Branding Docs

item.title: InfluxData Brand Colors
item.description: InfluxData Brand Colors The Offical Brand Colors are intended for all use cases. It is effective for UI, marketing graphics, and everything in between. Usage Rules Do not use colors outside of these colors Never use true black #000000 Primary Colors Deep Purple P0 #1F0A23 Pool P1 #22ADF6 White P2 #FFFFFF Secondary Colors Chartreuse S0 #D6F622 Magenta S1 #BF2FE5 Comet S2 #9394FF Nuetrals There are many nuetrals because they are the most used.

item.title: Hero Graphics
item.description: Hero Graphics Usage Rules All Hero Graphics should incorporate each of these three elements: Data + Time + Action The following options for each element are available to use in your compositions Data Data can be conceptual in the form of dimensional diagrams, or more literal representations of the various industries we serve and the types of data they generate Time A layer of time must be overlaid on top of our data layer; this can come in the form of timelines, stopwatch dials, radars, or equalizers

item.title: Messaging
item.description: Messaging How We Speak Values Voice Traits Respect Sincere Humility Plain-spoken Action Inspirational Courage Brave Openness Direct What We Say All Audiences Real time visibility into stacks, sensors, and systems The open-source time series database to instrument, observe, learn and automate any system, application and business process Dev Audience Built for developers Easy to start, easy to scale Optimized for time to awesome, InfluxDB is purpose built for time series data.

item.title: Platform
item.description: Brand Platform Our Core Passion Simplicity From the moment someone sets up InfluxDB, to the moment their time series data begins appearing, the magic of our product is that it is drop-dead simple. Everything we do and everything we say should reflect our commitment to making things as simple as possible. Brand Platform Vision Data is best understoodthrough the lens of time Time series data is an emerging category, but the power our platform provides can help people understand any dataset in a new dimension.
